title: Fire Forest Status schema
description: This entity describes the possible presence of smoke and/or fire in a forest.

smokeDetected.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. Presence of smoke detected by cameras.

smokeDetectedConfidence.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Confidence in smoke detection by cameras.

fireDetected.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. Presence of a fire detected by cameras.

fireDetectedConfidence.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Confidence in fire detection by cameras.

fireRiskIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Risk of fire index.

fireWeatherIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Risk of fire based on weather conditions.

fireForestDailyRiskIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Daily risk of fire.
